features: Portable and Lightweight: 1.4lbs light weight and foldable design makes this clothes steamer perfect for those on-the-go moments and in college dorm with an extended 8ft cord.

Easy and Safe: With only one button to control for steaming, our hand held steamer heats up in just 25 seconds, produces soft and long-lasting 216℉ steam for 10+ minutes. When the temperature exceeds, the device will power off immediately with built-in thermostat, avoiding overheating.
100% leak-proof: As a steamer iron travel size, it is designed to use in all angles. No matter you use it as a hanging iron and a flat iron, no water leaks.
Versatile: Suitable for all kind of garments, including delicate fabric like silk and lace, as well as cotton, wool, and more.
Note: Only applicable to 120V voltage. If plugging into a 220V outlet, you need an adapter and portable converter.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Steam Button The one touch operation use for steam output and lock for continuous steaming. Compact Size and Lightweight Our handheld clothes steamer is compact enough, to bring in your suitcase. Ultral light weight 1.4lbs and foldable 7.1"x3.15"x3.54" travel size. Visible Water Tank Transparent 100ml/3.5oz water tank for easier filling and more than 10 minutes of uninterrupted steaming, 100% no leaking, no spilling.

Stainless Steel Plate Keep the plate temperature around 216℉ for ironing, Get better result than plastic head. Extra-Long Power Cord An ultra-long 8ft/2.4m cord provides maximum reach and convenience Indicator Light Waiting for 25s, the indicator light turns white, and the garment steamer is ready to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect travel steamer
reviews.reviewText: I recently used it on my leather jacket to get the wrinkles out. It worked perfectly. The steam came out rather quickly once turned on. Very low warm up time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This steamer isn’t the best in the world but it isn’t the worst. It is pretty easy to use. You just use the little cup it comes with and put water in it and then pour the water in the steamer and turn it on. The handle closes to make it easier to travel with and store. The steam isn’t the most powerful but it’ll get the job done. A regular cotton shirt took me about 10 minutes. It doesn’t do the best job on jeans or thick linen but it did get about 60% of the wrinkles out so if you’re in a pinch you could use it to look a little better. This is one of the better travel steamers I have tested. I do recommend this steamer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Buena potencia de vapor y capacidad.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars La mejor compra, no se arrepentirán.
reviews.reviewText: Estaba batallando para desarrugar un vestido para asistir a una boda, este producto me solucionó el problema, lo recomiendo 100/ 100

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Effective but not efficient
reviews.reviewText: This little steamer has some pros and cons so I am not really sure how I feel about it. Pros, it's compact and great for traveling and gets wrinkles out. Cons, it takes longer to use than the conventional iron and board method, had to keep refilling the water tank, almost burnt my hand and it didn't give that crisp pressed look to my clothes. I can see the benefit of having it if you travel a lot but for daily use, I will stick to the iron and board method.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect travel steamer
reviews.reviewText: Recently used this while on a trip to Korea, and proved to be very useful. Made quick work of steaming my very wrinkled clothing. Super quick heat up and produced plenty of steam. Fairly intuitive to use. Really hits the mark for portability, and quite honestly is far more effective than I anticipated. It would take me maybe a minute, two at most, to steam a single shirt.Feels like it will last awhile. Just make sure to try and use the softest water you can - ideally distilled - but reverse osmosis is the next best option, which is what I use in any appliance with a water reservoir. This is probably the most important aspect to consider if you want to prolong the life of appliances like this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for delicate materials and a quick ironing, does dribble a bit horizontally
reviews.reviewText: The seekclass steamer looks really sleek and elegant, the look is what drew my attention to the product initially, functionality is good too. Light weight and compact, it folds nicely so you can store it away or carry it during travel which is great, when folding it the plastic creaks a little bit though which is a bit concerning and seems like the hinges aren’t the greatest. But the folding works well nevertheless. Power cord is a bit shorter than I would like at about 8 feet, depending on where your outlet is this could be a problem without an extension cord. The tank is large enough and easy to fill with the included funnel, you could run this thing for probably 15 minutes before a refill. Design is sleek and has a nice finish and branding on the product is good not too obtrusive.The steamer itself works really well, I tried with some delicates with light wrinkles which is usually what a steamer is better for and it worked very well, it takes longer to use than a regular iron but sometimes easier and less frustrating. The steam jet is good and powerful the steam comes out fairly consistently. A con of this product I see is it claims to be leak proof which is usually the main problem with steamers, they leak water onto clothes, this one doesn’t leak much when using it vertically. But when using horizontally it definitely leaks so probably don’t use it that way, even in the marketing video on the listing it clearly leaks in the video when using it horizontally so that is a bit misleading.But nevertheless for the price this steamer is good. It isn’t the perfect steamer since it does dribble and leak but it is light weight, affordable, portable, and gets wrinkles out.
